mapper.select: select shebei.*,landlog.returnstate,landlog.zjstart,landlog.zjend,landlog.patientname from hypertensionmanager.hytb_device_repertory shebei left join ( select landlog.uid,landlog.zjstart,landlog.zjend,landlog.returnstate,patient.name as patientname from hypertensionmanager.hytb_device_landlog landlog left join hypertensionmanager.t_users patient on landlog.patientid=patient.uid ) landlog on shebei.landlogid=landlog.uid order by shebei.uid desc
select uid from hytb_device_repertory where sn=#{sn} and uid!=#{uid}
select uid,landlogid,destroy from hytb_device_repertory where sn=#{sn}
mapper.update: update hytb_device_repertory set landlogid=#{landlogid} where uid=#{uid}
update hytb_device_repertory set destroy=2,landlogid=null where uid=${uid}
update hytb_device_repertory set landlogid=null where uid=${uid}
